name: tldrio
author: tldr.io
description: Discover, read and contribute human written summaries of Web pages. Save time, focus on what matters, stop opening too many tabs.

preferences.name: checkTldr
preferences.title: Check the existence of a tl;dr for a page
preferences.description: Set the badge in the url bar to indicate if there is a tl;dr available or not for the current page

preferences.name: injectEmbed
preferences.title: Inline tl;drs in Hacker News and Reddit comments page
preferences.description: Display the tl;dr if it exists and a form to submit one otherwise.

preferences.name: injectPreviews
preferences.title: Display a preview of Wikipedia entries.
preferences.description: Display a preview of Wikipedia entries.
